Title: Liotta? Liotta!
Plot: Ray Liotta appears on ""The Tonight Show,"" pledging his love to Maya.  She rejects him until he agrees to give up being in the public eye for her, although he finds it difficult to adjust to being a regular guy.  Elliott and Finch play a joke on cocky Jack, who has bought a desk once owned by George Washington.  And Nina creates a one-woman show based on her life.
GuestStars: Jay Leno, Ray Liotta, Robert Reinis, Sean Smith, Jason Huber
